verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Malachi|strong="H4401"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* loved \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* say, \w Wherein|strong="H4100"\w* hast \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* loved us? \w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*â€™s brother? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* loved \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*;

but \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \add gave \add*\w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* jackals \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w Whereas|strong="H3588"\w* Edom saith, \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w beaten|strong="H7567"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w*; \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w indignation|strong="H2194"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w ye|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w honoureth|strong="H3513"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* master: \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w then|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* mine \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*? \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*? saith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* despise \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* ye say, \w Wherein|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* despised \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?

Ye \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* ye say, \w Wherein|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* thee? \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* ye say, \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* contemptible.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*, \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5375"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*! \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5375"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*! \w Present|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*; \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*? \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w person|strong="H6440"\w*? saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w entreat|strong="H2470"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*: \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w means|strong="H3027"\w*: \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w accept|strong="H5375"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*? saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Oh|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H2656"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kindle \add fire on \add*\w mine|strong="H3027"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H2600"\w*! \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w going|strong="H8121"\w* \w down|strong="H3996"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* ye \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* ye say, \w The|strong="H2490"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H7979"\w* \w the|strong="H2490"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w*, \w and|strong="H7979"\w* \w the|strong="H2490"\w* \w fruit|strong="H2490"\w* thereof, even \w his|strong="H2490"\w* meat, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* contemptible.

Ye say \w also|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, what \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w weariness|strong="H4972"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5301"\w*! \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w snuffed|strong="H5301"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5301"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H1497"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w violence|strong="H1497"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*; thus ye bring \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? saith \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* cursed \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w deceiver|strong="H5230"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w voweth|strong="H5087"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemished|strong="H7843"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.
